title: World Of Warcraft with tbc expansion and patches upto 2.4.2
description:
Your internet connection should not be open at the time of installation.



I would recomend that u play on wowscape.net server.



-Install game from folder - "World Of Warcraft".

-Install expansion from folder - "The Burning Crusade Expansion".

-Install patches as numbered.

-If any new patch is released check with ur server before updating.

-Change ur "realmlist.wtf" as required.

-Enjoy the Game
